alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Itawamba; Lee; Monroe; Pontotoc; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 7:41PM CDT until April 13 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Chickasaw County in northeastern Mississippi... Calhoun County in northeastern Mississippi... Pontotoc County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Union County in northeastern Mississippi... Western Itawamba County in northeastern Mississippi... Lee County in northeastern Mississippi... Northwestern Monroe County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 741 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near New Harmony to Slate Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Pontotoc, Fulton, Houston, Baldwyn, Verona, Okolona, Trace State Park, Tombigbee State Park, Saltillo, Guntown, Bruce, Calhoun City, Shannon, Vardaman, Plantersville, Mantachie, Derma, Ecru and Pittsboro. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Chickasaw; Itawamba; Lee; Monroe; Pontotoc; Union
